txt.en: The Ruthless Dead can be found at Fennas Dûr in the Blackroot Vale.

The Ruthless Dead can be found at Fennas Dûr in the Blackroot Vale.\n\nYou have discovered the Ruthless Dead at Fennas Dûr. You should defeat or inconvenience them and keep safe the people of the Blackroot Vale.
You have defeated many of the Ruthless Dead at Fennas Dûr.
Defeated the Ruthless Dead at Fennas Dûr ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Despite the hope that they would fade after the Dead Men of Dunharrow fulfilled their oaths at Pelargir, the Ruthless Dead continue to trouble the people of the Blackroot Vale.
Defeat the Ruthless Dead at Fennas Dûr ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated the Ruthless Dead at Fennas Dûr ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the Ruthless Dead at Fennas Dûr (0/8)

Although King Elessar deemed that many of the Dead Men of Dunharrow fulfilled their oaths by defeating Balakhôr the Scourge and the Corsairs of Umbar at Pelargir, the unrepentant among them still haunt Fennas Dûr, the southernmost entrance to the Paths of the Dead.\n\nIt was whispered that one among them named Drugât sued for some measure of peace during the War of the Ring, but none in Gondor have seen him since this pronouncement,
